member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Error finding Application Id..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Assemblies found with no types loaded..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Parameter excpected to be "U" or "V".

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The DbAdapter type requested is not found..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Db object type must be a Table or View..

member.name: P:AutoPocoIO.Constants.ExceptionMessages.DbTypeNotRegistered
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The request is expecting a {0} database but it is not registered in Startup..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Configuration missing dependency resolver. Use an overload with service collection..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to EF Core does not support HierarchyId types yet..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Invalid Sql Data Type..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Could not load manifest resource stream..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Middleware path must start with a '/' followed by one or more characters..

member.name: P:AutoPocoIO.Constants.ExceptionMessages.MySqlNotRegistered
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The request is expecting a MySQL database but it is not registered in Startup..

member.name: P:AutoPocoIO.Constants.ExceptionMessages.NoDbTypesRegistered
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to No database types registered. Setup at least one database type in startup..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The request is expecting a Oracle database but it is not registered in Startup..

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The requested service was not registered in startup..

member.name: M:AutoPocoIO.DynamicSchema.Db.IDbAdapter.Add(System.Object)
member.summary: Begins tracking the given entity, and any other reachable entities that are not already being tracked, in the state such that they will be inserted into the database when is called.

member.name: M:AutoPocoIO.DynamicSchema.Db.IDbAdapter.Delete(System.Object)
member.summary: Begins tracking the given entity in the state such that it will be removed from the database when is called.

member.name: M:AutoPocoIO.DynamicSchema.Db.IDbAdapter.Find(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Finds an entity with the given primary key values. If an entity with the given primary key values is being tracked by the context, then it is returned immediately without making a request to the database. Otherwise, a query is made to the database for an entity with the given primary key values and this entity, if found, is attached to the context and returned. If no entity is found, then null is returned.
member.param: The values of the primary key for the entity to be found.

member.name: M:AutoPocoIO.DynamicSchema.Db.IDbAdapter.FilterByKey(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Finds an entity with the given primary key values. If an entity with the given primary key values is being tracked by the context, then it is returned immediately without making a request to the database. Otherwise, a query is made to the database for an entity with the given primary key values and this entity, if found, is attached to the context and returned. If no entity is found, then null is returned.
member.param: The values of the primary key for the entity to be found.
member.returns: A single value but still as an to allow for joins.

member.name: M:AutoPocoIO.DynamicSchema.Db.IDbAdapter.Save
member.summary: Saves all changes made in this context to the database.
member.returns: The number of state entries written to the database.
